Instructions.text: Welcome to the floation simulator. Should we quickly go through the user interface of the game?

Super! Checkout the values on the stream called Concentrate. This is the stream that goes from the flotation to the bin. On the right side of the screen you can see the Concentrate's Cu grade graph. What is the current Cu Grade of that stream?
Alright! We have to make sure this value is 5% or more, which is the specification of our product. Anything below that will not count.
Now tell me, what happens to the variable Cu RECOVERY if you change the air flow rate from 1 to 2 cm/s?
And what happens to the variable Cu GRADE if you change the froth from -20 to -10?
Good job. Now that you are introduced to the flotation views, your real training begins!
